vulnerabilities: Potential Denial of Service (DoS) due to uncontrolled resource consumption
description: The function does not have any mechanism to control or limit the amount of resources (memory) it consumes when buffering data. This can lead to a potential Denial of Service (DoS) attack, where an attacker can cause the application to consume excessive system resources, leading to slow performance or system crash. This is related to CWE-400: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion').
